p: Significant differences in gene expression were calculated using the paired-samples t-test with a significance level of p < 0.05, using SPSS version 24 (SPSS Inc., Chicago, IL, USA). All qRT-PCR expression analyses were performed in four replicates. The data were expressed as the mean ± standard error of the mean. Heatmaps were constructed using TBtools software (version 1.064).
